title: Vaibhavi Jadau Kundan Haaram - Timeless Elegance
features: Intricate Jadau setting showcasing uncut Kundan stones in a floral motif. Features a central pendant with a larger Emerald cabochon surrounded by Kundan. Delicate gold bead dangles (Guttapusalu style) add movement and grace. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, creating a rich, antique-inspired look. The back of the necklace is meticulously finished for comfort and aesthetic appeal.
occasions: traditional festivals like Sankranthi and Ugadi
description: This Vaibhavi Jadau Kundan Haaram represents the pinnacle of South Indian craftsmanship. The use of genuine Kundan and precious gemstones ensures lasting value. The timeless design blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire, making it a versatile investment for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a unique and sophisticated look, rarely seen in other pieces. A statement piece that exudes elegance and cultural richness.
